title: Fmr. FDIC Chair: Supreme Court Could Step In to Protect Fed
description: Sheila Bair, former FDIC chair and a member of the Center for Financial Stability Advisory Board, says the Supreme Court may draw a line to protect the Fed’s independence. She speaks with Romaine Bostick and Emily Graffeo on “The Close.” (Source: Bloomberg)
